Actions.Name: Add new client
Actions.Description: This operation creates a new client in your account. At least one field of the client (i.e. first name, last name, organization, email, etc) must be specified otherwise the operation will fail.

Actions.Name: Create new expense
Actions.Description: This operation creates a new expense in your account.

Actions.Name: Delete expense
Actions.Description: This operation is used to delete an existing expense from your account.

Actions.Name: List expenses
Actions.Description: Retrieves a list of all your expenses.

Actions.Name: When an expense is created or updated
Actions.Description: Triggers when a new expense is created or an existing one is updated.

Actions.Name: When an invoice is created or updated
Actions.Description: Triggers when a new invoice is created or an existing one is updated.

Actions.Name: When a payment is recorded or updated
Actions.Description: Triggers when a new payment is recorded or an existing one is updated.

Actions.Name: Update expense
Actions.Description: This operation is used to update an existing expense in your account.
